title: BREAKING: Aliens Land in Times Square!
text: "Witnesses claim to have seen a UFO landing in the middle of Times Square. Authorities are silent."

title: New Health Study released
text: "A new study shows that drinking water is good for you."

title: Celebrity X arrested for tax fraud
text: "Famous celebrity X has been arrested for massive tax evasion. Sources say he is in custody."

title: Stock Market hits all time high
text: "The stock market reached a new record high today driven by tech stocks."

title: Cure for all diseases found!
text: "A miracle drug has been discovered that cures all known diseases instantly."

title: Local election results announced
text: "The local election results have been announced with the incumbent winning by a small margin."

title: Government to ban all internet access
text: "The government is planning to shut down the internet completely next week."

title: Tech company releases new phone
text: "The latest smartphone features a better camera and longer battery life."

title: Natural disaster warning issued
text: "Meteorologists warn of a severe storm approaching the coast this weekend."

title: Secret society controls the world
text: "Leaked documents reveal a secret society has been controlling world events for centuries."
